text: Fixed #32923 -- Refactored out Field._clean_bound_field().
Refs #31026 -- Simplified BaseForm.get_context().
bf.errors returns an ErrorList

Access this directly and avoid creating
a new instance in BaseForm.get_context()
Calling str() on the ErrorList can also be deferred to when the
variable used in the template.
Refs #31026 -- Removed ability to return string when rendering ErrorDict/ErrorList.
Per deprecation timeline.
Refs #31026 -- Removed BaseForm._html_output() per deprecation timeline.
Fixed #34148 -- Reverted "Fixed #32901 -- Optimized BaseForm.__getitem__()."
This reverts commit edde2a069929c93e37835dc3f7c9a229040058e2
Thanks Jan Pieter Waagmeester for the report.
Used more augmented assignment statements.
Identified using the following command
Fixed #32339 -- Added div.html form template.
Refs #32339 -- Allowed renderer to specify default form and formset templates.
Co-authored-by: David Smith <smithdc@gmail.com>
Refs #33476 -- Reformatted code with Black.
Fixed #31026 -- Switched form rendering to template engine.

Thanks Carlton Gibson, Keryn Knight, Mariusz Felisiak, and Nick Pope
for reviews
Co-authored-by: Johannes Hoppe <info@johanneshoppe.com>
Fixed #32924 -- Changed BaseForm.get_initial_for_field() to remove microseconds when needed.
Refs #32920 -- Added BoundField._has_changed() for use in BaseForm.changed_data().
Fixed #32920 -- Changed BaseForm to access its values through bound fields.
Fixed #32917 -- Added BaseForm._widget_data_value()/_field_data_value().
Fixed #32901 -- Optimized BaseForm.__getitem__().
Simplified DeclarativeFieldsMetaclass.__new__() a bit.
Fixed #30261 -- Prevented Form._html_output() from mutating errors if hidden fields have errors.
Refs #23919 -- Replaced super(...) with super() in metaclasses.
Removed some outdated backwards compatibility imports and misleading comments.
EmptyResultSet moved in 46509cf13dbf049f75077981c29ef2c60b5a96ab
FieldDoesNotExist moved in 8958170755b37ce346ae5257c1000bd936faa3b0
BoundField and pretty_name moved in 8550161e531a603d57723850fb09c4c9b7ca60b9
EMPTY_VALUES moved in 471596fc1afcb9c6258d317c619eaf5fd394e797
BaseRunserverCommand moved in 5c53e30607014163872e89c221b206992a9acfef.
Fixed typos in docs, comments, and exception messages.
Fixed #29459 -- Initialized form data/files with empty MultiValueDicts.
Removed uneeded generator expressions and list comprehensions.
Fixed #30159 -- Removed unneeded use of OrderedDict.
Dicts preserve order since Python 3.6.
Fixed hanging indentation in various code.
Fixed #28171 -- Added an exception if Form's empty_permitted and use_required_attribute arguments conflict.
Fixed #29038 -- Removed closing slash from HTML void tags.
Fixed #28930 -- Simplified code with any() and all().
Fixed #28874 -- Prevented double escaping of errors on hidden form fields.
Fixed #28906 -- Removed unnecessary bool() calls.
Reverted "Fixed #27818 -- Replaced try/except/pass with contextlib.suppress()."

This reverts commit 550cb3a365dee4edfdd1563224d5304de2a57fda
because try/except performs better.
Fixed #27818 -- Replaced try/except/pass with contextlib.suppress().
Refs #27795 -- Replaced many force_text() with str()
Thanks Tim Graham for the review.
Fixed #27989 -- Preserved empty QueryDicts for form's data/files args.
Refs #27795 -- Removed unneeded force_text calls
Thanks Tim Graham for the review.
Refs #27656 -- Updated django.forms/docstring verbs according to PEP 257.
Converted usage of ugettext* functions to their gettext* aliases
Thanks Tim Graham for the review.
Refs #23919 -- Used DeclarativeFieldsMetaclass.__prepare__() for tracking form field order.
Refs #23919 -- Stopped inheriting from object to define new style classes.
Refs #23919 -- Removed most of remaining six usage
Thanks Tim Graham for the review.
Refs #23919 -- Removed six.<various>_types usage
Thanks Tim Graham and Simon Charette for the reviews.
Refs #23919 -- Removed python_2_unicode_compatible decorator usage
Refs #23919 -- Removed encoding preambles and future imports
Fixed #15667 -- Added template-based widget rendering.
Thanks Carl Meyer and Tim Graham for contributing to the patch.
Fixed #27068 -- Unified form field initial data retrieval.
Fixed #26917 -- Fixed crash in disabled ModelChoiceFields.
Partially reverted refs #25532 to fix a regression in Django 1.10

This reintroduces a crash for disabled forms.JSONField (refs #26949),
however, that issue is also present on Django 1.9
Thanks Ryan Schave for the test.
Fixed #22383 -- Added support for HTML5 required attribute on required form fields.
Refs #26502 -- Added choices to Form.__getitem__() KeyError message.
Fixed E128 flake8 warnings in django/.
Fixed #25532 -- Properly redisplayed JSONField form input values
Thanks David Szotten for the report and Tommy Beadle for code inspiration
Thanks Tim Graham for the review.
Refs #25294 -- Added BoundField import for backwards compatibility.
Refs #25294 -- Moved BoundField to django.forms.boundfield.
Fixed #25294 -- Allowed custom BoundFields on forms.
Removed BaseForm._raw_value().
Unused since efb0100ee67931329f17bc9988ecd5f0619cea14.
Used @cached_property for BaseForm.changed_data.
Fixed #25078 -- Added support for disabled form fields
Thanks Keryn Knight and Tim Graham for the reviews.
Fixed #12437 -- Added css_classes to Form._html_output()
Removed comment from Form.changed_data; refs #24191
Fixed #24788 -- Allowed Forms to specify a prefix at the class level.
Fixed #24497 -- Added Widget.supports_microseconds attribute
Fixed #24469 -- Refined escaping of Django's form elements in non-Django templates.
Refs #24469 -- Fixed escaping of forms, fields, and media in non-Django templates.
Fixed #5986 -- Added ability to customize order of Form fields
Fixed #24391 -- Made BoundField.value() cache callable values.
Sorted imports with isort; refs #23860.
Removed forms.forms.get_declared_fields() per deprecation timeline; refs #19617.
Fixed #23712 -- Fixed KeyError with BaseForm._html_output()
Removed redundant numbered parameters from str.format().
Since Python 2.7 and 3.1, "{0} {1}" is equivalent to "{} {}".
Limited lines to 119 characters in django/
Fixed #23167 -- Added BaseForm.__repr__()
Thanks Keryn Knight for the idea.
Fixed #23162 -- Renamed forms.Field._has_changed() to has_changed().
Fixed #22745 -- Prevented reevaluation of ModelChoiceField's queryset when accesssing BoundField's attrs.
Thanks Christian Schmitt for review.
Corrected a comment in forms/forms.py; refs #16612.
Fixed two typos in docstrings.
Ensured bound field renders as unicode safe data
Fixed #11776 -- Added CSS class for non-field/top of form errors.
Thanks Daniel Pope for the suggestion.
Fixed #22510 -- Harden field removal to only None.
Refs #8620

If we allow any value to remove form fields then we get name clashes
with method names, media classes etc

There was a backwards
incompatibility introduced meaning ModelForm subclasses with declared
fields called media or clean would lose those fields
Field removal is now only permitted by using the sentinel value None

The docs have been slightly reworded to refer to removal of fields
rather than shadowing

Thanks to gcbirzan for the report and initial patch, and several of the
core team for opinions.
Fixed #22533 -- Added label_suffix parameter to form fields.

Fields can now receive the `label_suffix` attribute, which will override
a form's `label_suffix`

This enhances the possibility to customize form's `label_suffix`, allowing
to use such customizations while using shortcuts such as
`{{ form.as_p }}`

Note that the field's own customization can be overridden at runtime by
using the `label_prefix` parameter to `BoundField.label_tag()`
Fixed #22502 -- Fixed microseconds/default/form interaction

Made explicit lack of microsecond handling by built-in datetime form
fields

Used that explicitness to appropriately nix microsecond
values in bound fields
Thanks Claude Paroz for the review.
Fixed #22570 -- Made Form.__getitem__ KeyError more descriptive.
Removed casting to bool just before negation.
Fixed #17922 -- Added required_css_class to form label.
Thanks hanson2010 for the suggestion.
Fixed #22318 -- Added Form.has_error() to easily check if a given error has happened.
Removed backwards compatibility code to call field.widget._has_changed()

This logic should be moved to field._has_changed() as described
in ebb504db692cac496f4f45762d1d14644c9fa6f - refs #16612.
Fixed #21188 -- Introduced subclasses for to-be-removed-in-django-XX warnings

Thanks Anssi Kääriäinen for the idea and Simon Charette for the
review.
Fixed many typos in comments and docstrings.
Thanks Piotr Kasprzyk for help with the patch.
Fixed #16192 -- Made unique error messages in ModelForm customizable.

Overriding the error messages now works for both unique fields, unique_together
and unique_for_date

This patch changed the overriding logic to allow customizing NON_FIELD_ERRORS
since previously only fields' errors were customizable
Refs #20199
Thanks leahculver for the suggestion.
Fixed docstring typo in django/forms/forms.py.
Fixed #17413 -- Serialization of form errors along with all metadata.
Fixed #20867 -- Added the Form.add_error() method.
Thanks @akaariai, @bmispelon, @mjtamlyn, @timgraham for the reviews.
Fixed flake8 E251 violations
More attacking E302 violators
Correct flake8 violation E261
Fixed up some more flake8 violations (this particular violation still has many occurrences in the tests/ dir so it can't be removed from setup.cfg yet)
Fixed #8620 -- Updated the Form metaclass to support excluding fields by shadowing them.
Fixed #19617 -- Refactored Form metaclasses to support more inheritance scenarios.
Thanks apollo13, funkybob and mjtamlyn for the reviews.
Ensured that BoundField.as_widget always returns properly localized fields.

This is a follow-up to #18777 which improperly converted to strings in
prepare_value and as such caused regressions like #21074
Fixed #17627 -- Renamed util.py files to utils.py

Thanks PaulM for the suggestion and Luke Granger-Brown and
Wiktor Kołodziej for the initial patch.
Fixed #5749 -- Added field_name as a key in the _html_output dict
Thanks SmileyChris for the suggestion.
Moved translator comment just above the target string
Fixed #20555 -- Make subwidget id attribute available

In `BoundField.__iter__`, the widget's id attribute is now passed to
each subwidget
A new id_for_label property was added to ChoiceInput.
Revert change to the default Form.clean()

This means it doesn't break for people who are doing
`cleaned_data = super(FooForm, self).clean()`.
Form.clean() does not need to return cleaned_data.
If it does, that will be used as the cleaned_data

The default
implementation has been changed to match this change.
Deprecated SortedDict (replaced with collections.OrderedDict)
Thanks Loic Bistuer for the review.
Removed most of absolute_import imports
Should be unneeded with Python 2.7 and up
Added some unicode_literals along the way.
Fixed #20805 -- Removed an extra colon beside checkboxes in the admin.
Thanks CollinAnderson for the report.
Fixed #20582 -- Allowed default Form.label_suffix to be translated
Thanks Tim Graham for the review.
Advanced deprecation warnings for Django 1.7.
Fixed #20618 -- Fixed regression in `BoundField.label_tag`.
Fixed #18134 -- BoundField.label_tag now includes the form's label_suffix

There was an inconsistency between how the label_tag for forms were
generated depending on which method was used: as_p, as_ul and as_table
contained code to append the label_suffix where as label_tag called on a
form field directly did NOT append the label_suffix

The code for
appending the label_suffix has been moved in to the label_tag code of
the field and the HTML generation code for as_p, as_ul and as_table now
calls this code as well

This is a backwards incompatible change because users who have added the
label_suffix manually in their templates may now get double label_suffix
characters in their forms.
Replaced `and...or...` constructs with PEP 308 conditional expressions.
Fixed #11725 -- Made possible to create widget label tag without "for"

Thanks Denis Martinez for the report and initial patch, and
Sergey Kolosov for bringing the patch up to date.
Fixed #18709 -- Check if initial_value is a callable

In _get_changed_data, check if initial_value is a callable and call it
if it is.
Replaced an antiquated pattern.
Thanks Lennart Regebro for pointing it out.
Fixed #20211: Document backwards-incompatible change in BoundField.label_tag

Also cleaned up label escaping and consolidated the test suite regarding
label_tag.
Fixed a regression in forms changed_data

Thanks Loic Bistuer for spotting the regression and the initial
patch
Fixed #16612 -- Improved has_changed detection for localized field values
Thanks Simon Charette for the review.
Fixed #19908 -- Added missing import in forms.py
Thanks loic84 for the report.
fixed minor typo #19703
Fixed #18483 -- Marked hidden field error string for translation

Thanks Evil Clay for the report and Emil Stenstrom for the initial
patch.
Used property decorators in django/forms.py
Moved has_changed logic from widget to form field
Refs #16612
Thanks Aymeric Augustin for the suggestion.
[py3] Refactored __unicode__ to __str__.

python_2_unicode_compatible
  test it under Python 2
[py3] Ported django.utils.encoding.
Python 2 for backwards compatibility)
and smart_bytes under Python 2 (which is backwards compatible)
Thus smart_str always returns a str objects
want a str.
[py3] Fixed access to dict keys/values/items.
Fixed #5524 -- Do not remove cleaned_data when a form fails validation

cleaned_data is no longer deleted when form validation fails but only
contains the data that did validate
Thanks to the various contributors to this patch (see ticket).
[py3] Replaced unicode/str by six.text_type/bytes.
[py3] Used six.with_metaclass wherever necessary.
Fixed #18572 - Python26 string format incompatibility
Thanks to anonymous/AeroNotix for the report
Changed a lot of internal code to use 'format_html' where appropriate/possible
Fixed #18269 -- Applied unicode_literals for Python 3 compatibility.

Thanks Vinay Sajip for the support of his django3 branch and
Jannis Leidel for the review.
Fixed #18013 -- Use the new 'as' syntax for exceptions.
Thanks Clueless for the initial patch
Note that unittest has been purposely left out (external package only used by Python 2.6).
Made a minor tweak to a doctoring in `django/forms.forms.py` that was missed in r17452. Thanks to Claude Paroz for the tip.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Clean up the form's code a little bit, to make it more consistantly go through one code path. Patch from Travis Swicegood.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Changed BoundField.subwidgets() to return SubWidget objects instead of rendered strings. This means we can access individual radio buttons' properties in the template (see new docs)
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Made BoundFields iterable, so that you can iterate over individual radio buttons of a RadioSelect in a template
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Remove comments referencing encryption. Django doesn't do encryption.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Remove more relative imports (I will kill them all).
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Removed a bunch more Python 2.4 workarounds now that we don't support that version. Refs #15702 -- thanks to jonash for the patch.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #10573 -- Corrected autofocus problem in admin when the first widget displayed is a multiwidget. Thanks to rduffield for the report, and to Ramiro and Julien Phalip for the patch.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixes #10427 -- Abstract the value generation of a BoundField
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #7048 -- Added ClearableFileInput widget to clear file fields. Thanks for report and patch, jarrow and Carl Meyer.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #13827 -- Cleaned up a few unnecessary function calls.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37

Fixed #13679, #13231, #7287 -- Ensured that models that have ForeignKeys/ManyToManyField can use a a callable default that returns a model instance/queryset. #13679 was a regression in behavior; the other two tickets are pleasant side effects. Thanks to 3point2 for the report.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #8426 - 'helptext' CSS class - hopefully for real this time.

This file was missing from [13519]
Thanks to mattmcc for the catch
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37

Fixed #12746 -- Updated sorting calls to use 'key' instead of 'cmp'. This will be slightly faster in certain circumstances, but more importantly, is a required step for migration to Python 3. Thanks to Martin van Loewis for the patch.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #13560 -- Fixed localization of widgets.
Particularly this fixes the SplitDateTimeField and the AdminDateWidget by localizating the widget's value in its render method instead of the form field
Thanks to David Danier for the report and Russell for help with the patch
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #13032  - Added localize parameter to form fields to be able to selectively enable localization.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #12434: Made pretty_name handle empty string and None as input. Thanks ales_zoulek and gabrielhurley.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #12960. The return value of ModelForm.clean() is now applied to the model. Thanks for the report, krejcik.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #12596. Calling super from a ModelForm's clean method is once again optional. Failing to call super only skips unique validation as documented. Thanks for the initial patch and tests, carljm.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #12466 - Set HTML class attributes for each field separately. Thanks for the patch, Bernd Schlapsi.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Merged soc2009/model-validation to trunk. Thanks, Honza!
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #11753 - Q objects with callables no longer explode on Python 2.4. Thanks, Jeremy Dunck.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #3512: it's now possible to add CSS hooks to required/erroneous form rows. Thanks, SmileyChris.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #11632: Fixed the id for hidden initial widget so that it is different from the id for its visible counterpart. Thanks geber@datacollect.com and Mark Lavin.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #10968 - Form.errors should use Form.error_class.
Thanks for report and initial patch, matehat
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #10002: inline file uploads now correctly display prior data. Thanks, dgouldin.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Forms in model formsets and inline formsets can now be deleted even if they don't validate. Related to #9587.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Edited docs/topics/forms/index.txt changes from [9569] and fixed a typo in the visible_fields() docstring
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Added a way to iterate over hidden/visible fields in a form. Useful for manual
form layout
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #6160, #9111 -- Consistently apply conditional_escape to form errors and labels when outputing them as HTML.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #9125 -- When displaying errors for a form with only hidden fields, make sure the resulting XHTML is correct.

Removed a conditional that slipped by that makes inline model formsets fail validation when re-submitted.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #7975 -- Callable defaults in inline model formsets now work correctly. Based on patch from msaelices. Thanks for your hard work msaelices.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #5216 -- Fixed a case of a string not being a unicode string.
Thanks to Vadim Fint for the test case
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
Fixed #7741: django.newforms is now django.forms. This is obviously a backwards-incompatible change. There's a warning upon import of django.newforms itself, but deeper imports will raise errors.
git-svn-id: bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
